conbody.p: The Capacity Report has the following column headings:

row.entry:
The resource whose capacity is being reported. A resource can be:
S3 Storage in GB
Elastic IP count
EBS Storage in GB
EC2 Compute in cores
EC2 Disk in GB
EC2 Memory in MB
VM Types by type (for example, “c1.medium”) count
Quantity of the resource free for use
Total available quantity for the resource
